China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 12 日星期五 06:29:12 GMT 120
Myanmar rebel alliance agree ceasefire with ruling military - rebel group TNLAAn alliance of ethnic minority armies in northern Myanmar has agreed a ceasefire with the ruling military, a leader of one of the groups, the TNLA, said on Friday, adding the talks involved an envoy from neighbouring China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:08:10 GMT L3B4JBMQUVM6ZE5NT6ZXDRFCT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-rebel-alliance-agree-ceasefire-with-ruling-military-rebel-group-tnla-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
WHO sees 'incredibly low' COVID, flu vaccination rates as cases surgeLow vaccination rates against the latest versions of COVID-19 and influenza are putting pressure on healthcare systems this winter, leading public health officials told Reuters. In the United States, several European countries, and other parts of the world, there have been reports of rising hospitalizations linked to respiratory infections in recent weeks. Death rates have also ticked up among older adults in some regions, but far below the COVID pandemic peak. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:02:48 GMT TBRLANBGZZP5XHRGIIS6QDBKQ4 https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/who-sees-incredible-low-covid-flu-vaccination-rates-case-surge-2024-01-12/Jennifer Rigby, Julie Steenhuysen商业医疗保健与制药
Americans Shelton, Korda fail to reach finals at Australian Open tune-up eventsAmericans Ben Shelton and Sebastian Korda crashed to defeats by lower-ranked opponents on Friday in the semi-finals of Australian Open warm-up tournaments. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:55:36 GMT 6QIOPO5NO5M6BHL2BVZEDO7Y4I https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/americans-shelton-korda-fail-to-reach-finals-australian-open-tune-up-events-2024-01-12/Reuters运动的网球
S.Korea court overturns conviction against contractor on Taiwan submarinesA South Korean appeals court has thrown out the conviction of a local company charged with violating trade laws for its work on Taiwan's new military submarine program, a ruling reviewed by Reuters showed. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:54:06 GMT NB6DD6MEQNO45EY44HDPJEARLY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/korea-court-overturns-conviction-against-contractor-taiwan-submarines-2024-01-12/Ju-Min Park世界亚太地区
Taiwan expects China to apply pressure on incoming government after electionTaiwan's government believes China is likely to attempt to put pressure on its incoming president after the island goes to the polls on Saturday, including staging military manoeuvres near the island this spring, two senior government officials said. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:17:46 GMT KIFK2TTNEZMSLLJRBHMNTXQKBU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-expects-china-to-apply-Pressure-incoming-government-after-election-2024-01-12/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
Taiwan's third party, looking for poll breakthrough, says it is happy to work with othersThe presidential candidate for the small Taiwan People's Party (TPP) said on Friday he is willing to set politics aside and work with other parties if he wins Saturday's election, describing himself as the only person Beijing and Washington would have no problem with. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 04:26:50 GMT LKG5J7IY6ZMGBCFOF6WA5NOOBM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwans-third-party-looking-poll-breakthrough-says-it-is-happy-working-with-others-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's exports rise, but deflation persists as economy enters 2024 on shaky footingChina's exports grew at a faster pace in December, while deflationary pressures persisted last month, keeping alive expectations for more policy easing measures to shore up an economy carrying significant pockets of weakness into 2024. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:47:11 GMT Q5K7LLT2RVPDXBINQ6IQHDIS4E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-trade-cpi-paint-mixed-economic-picture-start-2024-2024-01-12/Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao市场宏观问题
Blinken to meet senior Chinese official ahead of Taiwan electionsU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:30:08 GMT UGZZ2HWD4RNXXHPQRCTCR5QGUY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/blinking-meet-senior-chinese-official-ahead-taiwan-elections-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Oil jumps as US, UK strike Houthis in Yemen, shares subduedAsian shares were subdued on Friday as the escalating conflict in the Red Sea region sent oil prices surging, while slightly higher-than-expected U.S. inflation data did not dent investors' views on early and aggressive rate cuts in the U.S. and Europe. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:21:34 GMT TW2E3RVBFRNL3MBXVOOONTCSZM https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-12/Stella Qiu市场
Taiwan says it spotted more Chinese balloons over strait, a day ahead of voteTaiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:17:56 GMT QY3OI3K4AROYPGO5ORXEEVR23M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-it-spotted-more-chinese-balloons-over-straight-day-ahead-vote-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's economy faces growing deflationary pressures as prices extend fallChina's consumer prices declined for a third month in December while factory-gate prices extended their prolonged slide, highlighting persistent deflationary pressures in an economy struggling to mount a solid recovery. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:57:04 GMT HBPBALN2GJJSHA7SCAXRRS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-consumer-prices-stuck-decline-factory-gate-deflation-persists-2024-01-12/Reuters市场宏观问题
